review.title: “Creatively satisfying, great work environment, but without career development opportunities.”
review.pros: Pros – You are allowed all the freedom you want as long as you maintain communication with all other affected parties. You are encouraged to be creative and seek new growth opportunities, as well as new ways to market and promote the brand.
review.cons: Cons – Some of the managers are not forward thinking and that inhibits some improvement and keeps the firm from being seen as on the cutting edge of innovation.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Find a financial partner so that shelved projects can be pursued in this current marketplace, which is risky, but is also one where major moves can be realized at much lower costs.
